name: Medlife
goal: MedLife (BVB: M), through its subsidiaries and affiliates (“MedLife”), is one of the European private medical services companies, operating the largest network of clinics, medical laboratories, multi and mono disciplinary hospitals at national level, in Romania. Its Romanian network serves five million individual users. The stock issued by MedLife SA is accepted for trading on the spot regulated market, managed by the Bucharest Stock Exchange, under the Premium Category, trading symbol “M”. For more information, visit www.medlife.ro.
interests: Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Medlife follows a wide range of relevant policy areas, including:
- Capital Markets
- Consumer Protection
- Data Protection
- Sustainable Finance
